sentences.sContent: How can private companies compete fairly when their military rivals enjoy access to cheap land, credit and conscript labour—and have guns?
sentences.sContent_eng: How can private companies compete fairly when their military rivals enjoy access to cheap land, credit and conscript labour—and have guns?
sentences.sCn: 军方享有廉价的土地、信贷和士兵做劳工，而且手中有枪，私营公司怎么和他们公平竞争？

trans.tranOther: to make someone join the army, navy etc
